title: How many marks are required in Jee mains paper 2 to get a good college? - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to score a rank under 5k to get admission in NITs.The marks you need to score for this much rank depends upon your Board percentage and may vary accordingly

Each college have different eligibility of marks. So, it will be better to check the college website in which you want to take admission. This will give you an exact and clearl idea. I can tell you about Jamia Millia Islamia. In Jamia, last year the marks required in general category were 260+.
